item.title: Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Physical edition pre-orders open on January 30.

Limited Run Games has announced Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Physical pre-orders will be available from January 30 to March 1 in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition ($34.99)
    • A copy of the game
  • Classic Edition ($69.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • VHS slipcover and VHS tape box
    • Steelcase
  • Collector’s Edition ($109.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • VHS slipcover and VHS tape box
    • Steelcase
    • CD soundtrack
    • 12″ x 16″ double-sided poster
    • Mini cartridge replica collection
    • Acrylic standee diorama
    • Crazy caps (x6)
    • Trading cards (x5)

Here is an overview of the collection, via Limited Run Games:

About

Ren & Stimpy are back!

Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection includes:

  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Space Cadet Adventures (portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Veediots! (16-bit/portable)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Buckeroo$! (8-bit / 16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Time Warp (16-bit)
  • The Ren and Stimpy Show: Fire Dogs (16-bit)

Key Features

Rewind, save everywhere, and other quality of life upgrades! Music player featuring the soundtracks from each game. Museum featuring artwork and classic packaging scans.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/ren-stimpy-happy-happy-joy-joy-collection-announced-for-ps5-switch-and-pc

item.title: Reigns: The Witcher announced for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

Due out on February 27.

Publisher Devolver Digital and developer Nerial, in partnership with CD Projekt RED, have announced Reigns: The Witcher for PC and Mac (Steam, GOG), iOS, and Android. It will launch on February 25.

Here is an overview of the game, via Devolver Digital:

About

Adventure as Geralt through the ballads of Dandelion in Reigns: The Witcher, the latest mutation of the smash-hit swipe ’em up Reigns series from Nerial and Devolver Digital, set in the merciless, dark-fantasy world of CD Projekt RED’s award-winning The Witcher series.

As Geralt of Rivia, legendary monster slayer, you will navigate the moral maze and fight for survival through the drunken ballads of the bard. Will you hunt monsters, upset the locals, or run a hot bath? Compose an inspiring epic to perhaps, one day, claim immortality.

Key Features

  • A Witcher’s Work is Never Done – The dangerous or demeaning tasks given to you by the world’s colorful inhabitants can rarely be taken at face value. Dandelion’s ballads steer your story in dramatic and peculiar directions, via thousands of storyline combinations.
  • Back Together Again – Familiar faces including Yen, Triss, and Vesemir keep you company through memorable adventures retold by the bard.
  • Troubadour On Tour – Perform polished retellings of Geralt’s greatest hits away from the tavern to solve puzzles and unlock new deeds and characters. Level up the bard’s career to create ever more epic plotlines and ultimately achieve legendary status.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/reigns-the-witcher-announced-for-pc-ios-and-android
